Name: Tower Defense Hero
About the game: The world of swords and magic is waiting for you. Build towers to defend against enemy attacks; Comand your hero to block and destroy the enemy; Arm your hero with the equipment dropped by the enemy; Collect accessories to build legendary equipment; Challenge the powerful neutral creatures in the wild to get rich rewards; Ordinary, evil dreams, certain difficulties in hell, every time is a new adventure.
